channel.title: If command is used, 2nd player can't see me & another thing
channel.description:
1. First of all: I'm not using Delta. If I use a command such as ::home, the other player can't see me! It's only by teleport commands. How can this? Help please?
2. If I say something with normal talk, the 2nd player can't see it.
Thanks in advance. King Regards, Robin (Robintje1)

item.title: If command is used, 2nd player can't see me & another thing
